DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess effectiveness Coloplast Titan® Inflatable Penile Prosthesis ( IPP ) maintain increase penile length implantation device . It incorporate modify method cylinder size implantation max-inflate technique implantation .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Coloplast Titan® IPP Maintaining Penile Length While Treating Erectile Dysfunction ( ED )
